content: संसर्गः {@--1@} Commixture, junction, union. {@--2@} Contact, company, association, society; संसर्गमुक्तिः खलेषु <ls>Bh. 2. 62</ls>; <ls>Ś. 1. 3.</ls> {@--3@} Proximity, touch. {@--4@} Intercourse, familiarity. {@--5@} Copulation, sexual union; <ls>Ms. 6. 72.</ls> {@--6@} Co-existence, intimate relation.
